name: Thomas D'hulst
subDescription: Flutter lover and forever eager to learn
aboutDescription:
As a passionate budding developer, I'm always on the lookout for the latest trends in mobile applications. My aim is to create innovative applications that improve users' lives using emerging technologies.

I'm a problem solver, creative thinker and passionate collaborator, ready to take on any challenge to create sophisticated interfaces, improve performance and maximise the user experience.

Join me on this exciting journey where innovation knows no bounds and mobile applications are the way to create so many possibilities!

experiences.description: Flutter, Angular and Spring Boot technical stack for the creation and development of a robust web application and its API. Use of agile development methods. Technical reference, guaranteeing innovative, high-performance solutions in the development of mobile applications.
Refresher courses in maths for secondary school pupils, with personalised support.

projects.name: Control2Rack
projects.description: Creation of a customised mobile application, implementation of a BLoC architecture and daily monitoring

projects.name: Challeng'Us
projects.description: Creation of a challenge exchange application to make up for the lack of motivation during confinement. Research into requirements and target audience, creation of mock-ups and MVP. API documentation, Firebase social network management

projects.name: Labyrinthe en folie
projects.description: Creation of a python application for mazes and nonograms: resolution, compliance with specifications, image generation

projects.name: Carto'carbu
projects.description: Creation of a website to geolocate service stations, with various information sheets on these stations, with the possibility of creating accounts and commenting.

projects.name: Questionnaire
projects.description: Creation of an interactive questionnaire, which can be created from a text file, with a terminal or graphic display. Implementation of heritability tests and design patterns validating the various SOLID principles.

educations.title: Master's degree in E-Services IT
educations.description: Ergonomics and graphic design, software engineering, project management, languages and frontend and backend infrastructure technologies for the Web or applications

educations.title: Bachelor's degree in computer science
educations.description: Systems programming, automata definition, relational database complexity, object-oriented design

educations.title: Scientific Baccalaureate
educations.description: Mathematics, Physical Sciences, Chemistry, Computer Sciences Digital Sciences
